channel.title: Staking

item.title: Staking
item.dc:creator: @ladaswa ladaswa
item.description:
@ladaswa wrote:

This is my code for when you open the duel screen, I am too lazy to fix the staking dupes, because there is so many. As a solution I made it so you can’t offer items. The only problem is when I make it so canoffer = false, you can no longer toggle any of the staking options. help please? My base is Pi.

public void openDuel() {
Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.duelingWith];
if(o == null) {
return;
}
c.duelStatus = 1;
refreshduelRules();
refreshDuelScreen();
c.canOffer = false;
c.sendMessage(“Staking has been removed due to bugs. Sorry…”);
for (int i = 0; i < c.playerEquipment.length; i++) {
sendDuelEquipment(c.playerEquipment[i], c.playerEquipmentN[i], i);
}
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Dueling with: " + o.playerName + " (level-” + o.combatLevel + “)”, 6671);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 6684);
c.getPA().sendFrame248(6575, 3321);
c.getItems().resetItems(3322);

}
